attributes.action: Install vertical wind turbines along railways
attributes.additional_details: This will produce electricity to supply big amount of consumers. Maybe in future will be enough to supply full city
attributes.background: Trains are producing strong wind. Need to install vertical wind turbines along railways, especially along fast trains railways. Better in that part of railways where trains reach the maximum speed.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about installation of energy generators are a matter for energy suppliers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
